description: Fuu is a retainer of the Xing Empire`s Yao clan, a personal bodyguard of http://anidb.net/ch10402 [Prince Ling] and the grandfather of Ling`s other bodyguard, http://anidb.net/ch10406 [Lan Fan]. Particularly wise and exceptionally skilled, Fuu serves as a valuable asset to Prince Ling by utilizing his advanced combat abilities, strategic and observational expertise, and fierce loyalty to the Yao in a great many of varying situations.
name: Fuu
